title: How do I view contacts stored on the SIM card
answer:
For EMUI 2.0 and EMUI 3.0, go to the contacts list, open the options menu and then select Contacts to display. Then enable the Show SIM contacts switch and select All contacts. 

 For EMUI 2.3, go to the contacts list, open the options menu and then select Contacts to display before selecting All contacts. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=123056)

 Please wait patiently after the SIM card has been inserted as it takes some time to load the contacts.
keywords: SIM card, contacts, address book, display
